title: kandan kazhalaDiyai
sahitya:
kandan kazhalaDiyai cintai negizhndiDa vandanai purinduyya cendUr sEra vArum


anupallavi

  endak-kavalaiyumE emmai varuttAmal irundu ini magizhum nirai vAzhvaip-pera


caraNam    kaDarkkarai arugilE kalai niraik-kOyilil kuDi koNDirukkum vaDivazhaguDaiyOn
aDi paNindiDum tan aDiyAr kaDaittEra aNaiyum aruL mighu tuNaikku iNaiyaTra
